FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Everything you need to know about Nano Banana to Video

items.question: How to convert Nano Banana to video?
items.answer: Converting Nano Banana to video is simple: 1) Select your preferred AI model (Sora 2 or Veo 3.1), 2) Choose your generation mode (text-to-video or image-to-video), 3) Upload your Nano Banana image if using image-to-video, 4) Enter your prompt describing the video motion, 5) Click generate and wait 3-10 minutes for your video to be ready.

items.question: Is Nano Banana to video free?
items.answer: Yes! We offer free trial credits so you can test the video generation without any payment. All generated videos are watermark-free. After using your free credits, you can choose to pay as you go or subscribe for unlimited video generation.

items.question: How to remove watermark from Nano Banana videos?
items.answer: All videos generated on our platform are automatically watermark-free! You don't need to do anything special. Unlike other platforms, we don't add watermarks to your videos, so they're ready for professional and commercial use immediately.

items.question: Nano Banana vs Sora vs Veo 3 - which is better?
items.answer: Each model has its strengths: Sora 2 excels at realistic motion and high-quality output, perfect for cinematic videos. Veo 3.1 Fast is the fastest option with multiple generation modes, ideal for quick turnaround. Nano Banana Edit is great for image editing before video generation. We recommend trying all models with your free credits to see which fits your needs best.

items.question: Can I use Nano Banana videos commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All videos generated on our platform come with commercial use rights. You can use them for UGC ads, TikTok content, YouTube videos, e-commerce stores, and any other commercial purposes without any restrictions.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
items.answer: Video generation typically takes 3-10 minutes depending on the model and complexity. Veo 3.1 Fast is the quickest (3-5 minutes), while Sora 2 may take 5-10 minutes for higher quality results. You can track the progress in real-time with our live status updates.

items.question: What video formats are supported?
items.answer: All videos are generated in standard MP4 format with 1080p resolution. This format is compatible with all major platforms including TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Shopify, and more. The videos are optimized for web streaming and download.

items.question: Do I need to create an account to use it?
items.answer: You can try the video generation without an account, but creating a free account allows you to save your videos, track your generation history, and manage your credits more easily. Account creation is quick and only requires an email or social login.

items.question: How to get 1080p video from Nano Banana?
items.answer: All videos generated on our platform are automatically created in 1080p resolution! Simply generate your video as normal using either Sora 2 or Veo 3.1, and the output will be in full HD 1080p quality, perfect for professional use.

items.question: What are the best prompts for video generation?
items.answer: The best prompts are detailed and specific. Describe the motion you want, camera movements, lighting, and atmosphere. For example: 'Camera slowly pans across a sunset beach while waves gently crash on the shore' works better than just 'beach video'. Include details about speed (slow, fast), direction (left to right, zoom in), and mood (calm, energetic).
